ack.p: The manuscript benefited from suggestions by D. Stralberg, S. Nielsen, J. Michalak, T. Wang. M. Chapman and four anonymous reviewers. The Wilburforce Foundation provided support for the Adaptwest Climate Adaptation Planning Project ( http://adaptwest.databasin.org) of which this paper is a product. Data have been deposited in the Dryad Repository: http://dx.doi.org/10.5061/dryad.q8d7d
